name: Zeitview
headline: Inspection software for renewable energy & sustainable infrastructure
description: At Zeitview, our goal is to accelerate the transition to renewable energy and sustainable infrastructure. We do this by combining advanced inspection software with the ability to capture visual data in more than 60 countries. This allows us to deliver safer, faster, lower-cost inspections of energy and infrastructure assets with a high degree of accuracy and repeatability. We use artificial intelligence and machine learning to ingest and analyze vast amounts of visual data to provide objective insights that our customers can act on immediately.

founders.name: Dan Burton, Founder
founders.description: Zeitview Founder/CEO; US Marine Corps Infantry; Goldman Sachs; US Senate Staff

  * ## Our Mission
Our mission is to accelerate the global transition to renewable energy and sustainable infrastructure through advanced inspection solutions.
[ Learn More ](https://www.zeitview.com/</#learn_more>)
  * ## Our Mission
Our mission is to accelerate the global transition to renewable energy and sustainable infrastructure through advanced inspection solutions.
[ Learn More ](https://www.zeitview.com/</#learn_more>)


Item 1 of 2
## What We Do
At Zeitview, our goal is to accelerate the transition to renewable energy and sustainable infrastructure. We do this by combining advanced inspection software with the ability to capture visual data in more than 60 countries. This allows us to deliver safer, faster, lower-cost inspections of energy and infrastructure assets with a high degree of accuracy and repeatability. We use artificial intelligence and machine learning to ingest and analyze vast amounts of visual data to provide objective insights that our customers can act on immediately.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6229b8a65380461f8a76c246/1646908857422-B1S48AQIVF7RS1S4CV1B/data_input_icon.jpg)
Reliable Partnership
We are second to none at operational excellence and partnering with our customers to achieve flexible, long-term solutions across their multiple asset classes. 
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6229b8a65380461f8a76c246/1646908891145-AXCEP7MTZCLL05GPV4GX/analyze_icon.jpg)
Your Bottom Line
Helping customers operate efficiently and lower operation and maintenance costs is key to accelerating the global transition to renewable energy and sustainable infrastructure.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6229b8a65380461f8a76c246/1646908909129-ZY3KEXA9FDIMFIHMVCVY/Report_icon.jpg)
Multi-Asset Expertise
For businesses operating in multiple business sectors with a variety of asset classes, Zeitview provides a single partner for advanced inspection across solar, wind, properties, telecom, and utility assets. 
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6229b8a65380461f8a76c246/7f1a88f3-6580-4722-84dc-bd75ba70c5f3/zeitview_Insights.png)
## Zeitview Insights
Make better-informed, near real-time decisions about your most critical assets at scale.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6229b8a65380461f8a76c246/602f74a4-afea-449c-a3d6-3054f26e8622/background_1.png)
## Our Solutions
Whether you’re monitoring the progress of a construction project, analyzing the condition of rooftops, inspecting a set of wind turbines, or maintaining the health of a solar facility, you can track, survey, inspect, and manage your inspections with 
Zeitview Insights.
  * ## Understand Each Property’s Condition
Zeitview Property Insights delivers actionable, near real-time data of every aspect of your building. With solutions for roofing, property management, insurance and construction.
[ Property Insights Platform ](https://www.zeitview.com/</properties>)
  * ## Mitigate Risk and Enhance Maintenance Planning
Zeitview Wind Insights fuses data collection, processing, collaboration, and reporting, to deliver efficient inspections and improve asset management.
[ Wind Insights Platform ](https://www.zeitview.com/</wind>)
  * ## Improve Solar Asset Performance
Zeitview Solar Insights simplifies thermal inspections at scale, leveraging the industries largest global network of UAV and manned aircraft operators
[ Solar Insights Platform ](https://www.zeitview.com/</solar>)
  * ## Telecom Advance Inspections
Zeitview Telecom Insights makes it easy to track inventory changes, ensure proper billing, and improve safety by reducing unnecessary tower climbs. 
[ Telecom Insights Platform ](https://www.zeitview.com/</telecom>)
  * ## Map and Analyse Utility Assets
Zeitview Utility Insights couples the speed and accuracy of drones with the advanced analysis provided by machine learning and artificial intelligence to help reduce risk and improve grid resiliency 
[ Utility Insights Platform ](https://www.zeitview.com/</utilities>)


Item 1 of 5
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6229b8a65380461f8a76c246/489b628a-3301-4818-bc22-5ff3122b7dd5/curve_bg.png)
Industries
  * ## Property Management
Manage properties globally with image based inspections to assess roof health, building facades, parking lots, and more. 
[Learn More](https://www.zeitview.com/</properties>)
  * ## Wind
Enhance safety and obtain precise data with image based inspections, analytics, and lifecycle management.
[Learn More](https://www.zeitview.com/</wind>)
  * ## Solar
Improve site performance and energy yield of solar assets through thermal inspections and asset management tools
[Learn More](https://www.zeitview.com/</solar>)
  * ## Construction
Leverage aerial data to power decisions through visual projects updates, monitoring, mapping, and models.
[Learn More](https://www.zeitview.com/</construction>)
  * ## Roofing
Rooftop inspection solutions for commercial and residential roofing companies
[Learn More](https://www.zeitview.com/</roofing>)
  * ## Utilities
Quickly and easily inspect large amounts of distribution lines to analyze for hazards, plan maintenance and reduce risk. 
[Learn More](https://www.zeitview.com/</utilities>)
  * ## Telecom
Understand tower condition, installed assets, and available capacity to reduce costs, improve billing, and enhance safety. 
[Learn More](https://www.zeitview.com/</telecom>)

  * ## Our Mission
Our mission is to accelerate the global transition to renewable energy and sustainable infrastructure through advanced inspection solutions.
 Learn More ⟨30⟩


Item 1 of 2
## What We Do
At Zeitview, our goal is to accelerate the transition to renewable energy and sustainable infrastructure. We do this by combining advanced inspection software with the ability to capture visual data in more than 60 countries. This allows us to deliver safer, faster, lower-cost inspections of energy and infrastructure assets with a high degree of accuracy and repeatability. We use artificial intelligence and machine learning to ingest and analyze vast amounts of visual data to provide objective insights that our customers can act on immediately.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6229b8a65380461f8a76c246/1646908857422-B1S48AQIVF7RS1S4CV1B/data_input_icon.jpg)
Reliable Partnership
We are second to none at operational excellence and partnering with our customers to achieve flexible, long-term solutions across their multiple asset classes. 
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6229b8a65380461f8a76c246/1646908891145-AXCEP7MTZCLL05GPV4GX/analyze_icon.jpg)
Your Bottom Line
Helping customers operate efficiently and lower operation and maintenance costs is key to accelerating the global transition to renewable energy and sustainable infrastructure.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6229b8a65380461f8a76c246/1646908909129-ZY3KEXA9FDIMFIHMVCVY/Report_icon.jpg)
Multi-Asset Expertise
For businesses operating in multiple business sectors with a variety of asset classes, Zeitview provides a single partner for advanced inspection across solar, wind, properties, telecom, and utility assets. 
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6229b8a65380461f8a76c246/7f1a88f3-6580-4722-84dc-bd75ba70c5f3/zeitview_Insights.png)

generated_description:
Zeitview is a cutting-edge inspection software company based in Santa Monica, California, that was founded in 2014. It is part of the esteemed Y Combinator Batch W15 and has a robust team of 200 employees. Zeitview's mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to accelerate the global transition to renewable energy and sustainable infrastructure. They achieve this through advanced inspection solutions that leverage artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML), helping capture and analyze visual data across more than 60 countries.

Their core offering revolves around enhanced inspection processes for energy and infrastructure assets. By utilizing AI and extensive visual data gathering, Zeitview delivers inspections that are safer, faster, and more cost-effective, all while ensuring a high degree of accuracy and repeatability. The company's solutions touch on multiple sectors, including solar, wind, commercial real estate, construction, and utilities, making them a versatile partner for businesses managing various asset classifications.

The technology they employ, known as Zeitview Insights, helps clients make informed, near real-time decisions about their crucial assets. Services include specialized insights for solar and wind assets, property management, and maintenance planning—all aimed at reducing operational costs and enhancing asset performance.

Zeitview is tagged under various categories such as artificial intelligence, drones, B2B, climate, and renewable energy, showcasing its commitment to environmental sustainability. With its innovative approach and comprehensive solutions, Zeitview is setting the stage for a more efficient and green future in asset management and infrastructure inspection.

You can learn more about their offerings and initiatives on their website: [Zeitview](https://www.zeitview.com/).
